W1.description: Create commands/plugin-enhancers.md (registry + detection protocol + format rules)

W1-review.description: Validate W1: test detection against installed_plugins.json, confirm agent dispatch works, verify result format

W2.description: Modify commands/blueprint.md — Stage 5 expanded review options (pr-review-toolkit deep dive)

W3.description: Modify commands/review.md — optional deep analysis Stage 5 using pr-review-toolkit agents

W4.description: Modify commands/dispatch.md — extended review lenses (silent-failures, types, comments, simplify, test-coverage)

notes: Phase 1 only. W2/W3/W4 can run in parallel after W1-review gate. Down from 8 units in rev 0.
